name: constrict
effect: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 10% chance to lower the target’s Speed by one stage.
short_effect: Has a 10% chance to lower the target’s Speed by one stage.

flavor_text.ruby_sapphire: Constricts to inflict pain. May lower SPEED.
flavor_text.emerald: Constricts to inflict pain. May lower SPEED.
flavor_text.firered_leafgreen: The foe is attacked with long tentacles or vines. It may lower SPEED.
